page.title: 01MAIN FEATURES OF OUR AREA
page.content:
{LILLIESLEAF}IS A VILLAGE IN THE { {SOUTHERN UPLANDS}IN THE{SCOTTISH {BORDERS.
THE AREA AROUND{LILLIESLEAF}IS MAINLY FARMLAND AND PARTLY WOODLAND.THERE IS ALSO A MOSS,A MARSHLAND AREA,AT THE SOUTH SIDE OF THE VILLAGE.
MEN HAVE LIVED IN THIS AREA FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS.THERE WAS A{HILL {FORT}AND A{ROMAN MARCHING CAMP.
THE OLD ESTATE OF{LILLIESLEAF}WAS ORIGINALLY AT{RIDDELL}WHERE THERE WAS A BIG HOUSE,NOW IN RUINS.THE HOUSE IS OVERLOOKED BY THE{GENERALS TOWER}WHICH WAS BUILT BY THE{SPROT}FAMILY IN{1885 BETWEEN THE HOUSE AND THE TOWER IS THE {MAUSOLEUM}WHICH WAS BUILT BY THE{SPROT FAMILY IN{1858}AND CLOSE BY IS THE{OLD {MILL}WHICH WAS BUILT BY THE{RIDDELL'S.
